summary: The humanity is suffering from murders all over the globe, called "Mincemeat murders". High school student, Izumi Shinichi has a parasite living off him, having replaced his right hand, and he might be the discoverer of truth.
cast: Shôta Sometani|Eri Fukatsu|Ai Hashimoto|Kazuki Kitamura|Masahiro Higashide|Tadanobu Asano|Miko Yoki|Jun Kunimura|Hirofumi Arai|Pierre Taki|Sadao Abe|Satoshi Araki|Seiji Hino|Mansaku Ikeuchi|Hideto Iwai|Taiju Nakane|Nao Ohmori|Shûji Okui|Kosuke Toyohara|Takashi Yamanaka|Kimiko Yo
keywords: live action remake of anime|shape shifter|anime adaptation|mother son relationship|invasion
title: Parásito. Parte 1
